author: Joseph Zeballos-Roig
title: The Senate passed a major cryptocurrency bill — a big victory for digital assets
description: The digital asset sector has long craved legitimacy through federal regulation
content: The Senate approved a big cryptocurrency bill in a 68-30 vote on Tuesday, with 18 Democrats joining most GOP senators to hand a victory to a digital asset sector that's long craved legitimacy through… [+1814 chars]
